argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_prmz | |- ( P e. Prime -> P e. ZZ ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN ) -> P e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zexpcl | |- ( ( P e. ZZ /\ n e. NN0 ) -> ( P ^ n ) e. ZZ ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN ) /\ n e. NN0 ) -> ( P ^ n ) e. ZZ ) |
| 5 |  | #P_iddvds | |- ( ( P ^ n ) e. ZZ -> ( P ^ n ) || ( P ^ n ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN ) /\ n e. NN0 ) -> ( P ^ n ) || ( P ^ n ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_breq1 | |- ( A = ( P ^ n ) -> ( A || ( P ^ n ) <-> ( P ^ n ) || ( P ^ n ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN ) /\ n e. NN0 ) -> ( A = ( P ^ n ) -> A || ( P ^ n ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_reximdva | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN ) -> ( E. n e. NN0 A = ( P ^ n ) -> E. n e. NN0 A || ( P ^ n ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_pcprmpw2 | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN ) -> ( E. n e. NN0 A || ( P ^ n ) <-> A = ( P ^ ( P pCnt A ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylibd | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN ) -> ( E. n e. NN0 A = ( P ^ n ) -> A = ( P ^ ( P pCnt A ) ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_pccl | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN ) -> ( P pCnt A ) e. NN0 ) |
| 13 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( n = ( P pCnt A ) -> ( P ^ n ) = ( P ^ ( P pCnt A ) ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( n = ( P pCnt A ) -> ( A = ( P ^ n ) <-> A = ( P ^ ( P pCnt A ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( ( P pCnt A ) e. NN0 /\ A = ( P ^ ( P pCnt A ) ) ) -> E. n e. NN0 A = ( P ^ n ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_ex | |- ( ( P pCnt A ) e. NN0 -> ( A = ( P ^ ( P pCnt A ) ) -> E. n e. NN0 A = ( P ^ n ) ) ) |
| 17 | 12, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN ) -> ( A = ( P ^ ( P pCnt A ) ) -> E. n e. NN0 A = ( P ^ n ) ) ) |
| 18 | 11, 17 | #P_impbid | |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. NN ) -> ( E. n e. NN0 A = ( P ^ n ) <-> A = ( P ^ ( P pCnt A ) ) ) ) |
